metrics.name: Average processing time for purchase orders
metrics.description: Average time from the creation of a purchase order to its acknowledgment
metrics.signalFragment:
AVG(
	(SELECT LAST(end_time)
		WHERE event_name IN (${ato_po_acknowledgement_events}))
	-(SELECT FIRST(end_time)
		WHERE event_name IN (${ato_po_creation_events}))
   )

metrics.name: Average confirmation time for purchase requisitions
metrics.description: Average time needed to confirm a purchase requisition by creating a purchase order
metrics.signalFragment:
AVG(
	(SELECT LAST(end_time)
		WHERE event_name IN (${ato_po_creation_events}))
	-(SELECT FIRST(end_time)
		WHERE event_name IN (${ato_pr_creation_events}))
   )

metrics.name: Goods return rate
metrics.description: Percentage of cases with delivery returns
metrics.signalFragment:
COUNT(case_id) FILTER (
	WHERE (SELECT COUNT(event_name)
			WHERE event_name IN (${ato_return_delivery_events})) > 0
	)
/ COUNT(case_id)
* 100

metrics.name: Average time from purchase order to delivery
metrics.description: Average time from purchase order to goods receipt
metrics.signalFragment:
AVG(
	(SELECT LAST(end_time)
		WHERE event_name IN (${ato_goods_receipt_events}))
	-(SELECT FIRST(end_time)
		WHERE event_name IN (${ato_po_creation_events}))
   )

metrics.name: Process compliance
metrics.description: Percentage of compliant Acquire-to-Onboard cases
metrics.signalFragment:
COUNT(case_id) FILTER (
	WHERE event_name MATCHES(${ato_compliant_event_sequence})
	)
/ COUNT(case_id)
* 100

metrics.name: Two-way match rate
metrics.description: Percentage of purchase orders with a two-way match
metrics.signalFragment:
COUNT(case_id) FILTER (
	WHERE (${ato_two_way_match_condition})
	)
/ COUNT(case_id)
* 100

metrics.name: Late deliveries cases
metrics.description: Number of cases with late deliveries. Only cases that have been completely delivered are considered.

metrics.name: Late deliveries rate
metrics.description: Percentage of cases with late deliveries. Only cases that have been completely delivered are considered.

metrics.name: Average delay of late deliveries
metrics.description: The average delay time of late deliveries. Only cases that have been completely delivered are considered.

metrics.name: On-Time Delivery rate
metrics.description: Percentage of cases with on-time deliveries. Only cases that have been completely delivered are considered.

metrics.name: Overdue deliveries cases
metrics.description: Number of cases with overdue deliveries. Only cases that have not been (completely) delivered yet are considered.

metrics.name: Overdue deliveries rate
metrics.description: Percentage of cases with overdue deliveries. Only cases that have not been (completely) delivered yet are considered.

metrics.name: Maverick Buying - Prices Changes after Goods Receipt
metrics.description: Total number of cases with price changes that happened after the Goods Receipt had already been registered
metrics.signalFragment:
COUNT(case_id) FILTER (
	WHERE event_name MATCHES(${ato_maverick_buying_price_change_condition})
	)
/ COUNT(case_id) * 100

metrics.name: Maverick Buying Rate - PO Creation after Invoice Creation
metrics.description: Percentage of cases in which the PO Item was created after the Invoice, a common indicator for Maverick Buying
metrics.signalFragment:
COUNT(case_id) FILTER (
	WHERE event_name MATCHES(${ato_maverick_buying_po_after_invoice_condition})
	)
/ COUNT(case_id) * 100

metrics.name: POs created after Invoice Creation
metrics.description: Total number of cases in which a PO Item has been created after the Invoice Creation event
metrics.signalFragment:
COUNT(case_id) FILTER
	(WHERE (event_name MATCHES(${ato_po_created_after_invoice_created})))

metrics.name: No-touch-order rate
metrics.description: Percentage of no-touch-orders, which are cases that ran without any changes or typical rework events. Automation of events is not considered.
metrics.signalFragment:
COUNT(case_id) FILTER (
	WHERE NOT (event_name MATCHES (${ato_change_event_flow})) AND (event_name MATCHES(${ato_goods_receipt_events}))
	)
/ (COUNT(case_id) FILTER (
	WHERE event_name MATCHES(${ato_goods_receipt_events}))
	)
* 100

metrics.name: Invoices waiting for Goods Receipt
metrics.description: Total number of cases with Invoices waiting for the Goods Receipt event
metrics.signalFragment:
COUNT(case_id) FILTER (
	WHERE NOT (event_name MATCHES(${ato_goods_receipt_events}))
	AND (event_name MATCHES(${ato_invoice_event_flow}))
	)

metrics.name: Perfect order fulfillment rate
metrics.description: Percentage of cases that went through without any reversal of Goods Receipts
metrics.signalFragment:
(COUNT(case_id) FILTER (
	WHERE (event_name MATCHES(${ato_goods_receipt_events}))
	)
	-
	COUNT(case_id) FILTER (
	WHERE (event_name MATCHES(${ato_goods_receipt_reversal_events}))
	))
	/
	COUNT(case_id) FILTER (
	WHERE (event_name MATCHES(${ato_goods_receipt_events}))
	)
	* 100

metrics.name: Automation rate for asset creation
metrics.description: Percentage of cases with automated asset creation

metrics.name: Automation rate for invoice creation
metrics.description: Percentage of cases with automated invoice creation

metrics.name: Automation rate for purchase orders creation
metrics.description: Percentage of cases with automated purchase orders creation

metrics.name: Average cycle time asset creation to asset activation
metrics.description: Average cycle time between asset crated and asset capitalization
metrics.signalFragment:
AVG ((SELECT LAST (END_TIME) FILTER (
	WHERE EVENT_NAME IN ('Capitalize Asset Item'))) 
	- (SELECT FIRST (END_TIME) FILTER (
	WHERE EVENT_NAME IN ('Create Asset Item')
)))

metrics.name: Average cycle time purchase order to asset creation
metrics.description: Average cycle time between purchase order creation and asset creation
metrics.signalFragment:
AVG ((SELECT LAST (END_TIME) FILTER (
 	WHERE EVENT_NAME IN ('Create Asset Item')
)) 
	- (SELECT FIRST (END_TIME) FILTER (
	WHERE EVENT_NAME IN ('Create PO Item'))))

metrics.name: Average cycle time purchase order to invoice posting
metrics.description: Average cycle time between purchase order creation and invoice posting
metrics.signalFragment:
AVG ((SELECT LAST (END_TIME) FILTER (
	WHERE EVENT_NAME IN ('Post FI Invoice'))) 
	- (SELECT FIRST (END_TIME) FILTER (
	WHERE EVENT_NAME IN ('Create PO Item'))))

variables.name: ato_po_creation_events
variables.description: Events indicating the creation of a purchase order, for example 'Create PO Item'

variables.name: ato_po_acknowledgement_events
variables.description: Events indicating the acknowledgement of a purchase order item, for example 'Receive Order Confirmation'

variables.name: ato_aa_change_event_flow
variables.description: Events indicating changes to asset accounting item, for example 'Update Capitalization Date'

variables.name: ato_pr_creation_events
variables.description: Events indicating the creation of a purchase requisition item, for example 'Create PR Item'

variables.name: ato_invoice_event_flow
variables.description: Event flow indicating the creation of an invoice, for example ('Create FI Invoice')

variables.name: ato_po_created_after_invoice_created
variables.description: Event flow indicating the creation of a PO Item after the Invoice has been created, for example ('Create FI Invoice') ~> 'Create PO Item'

variables.name: ato_return_delivery_events
variables.description: Events identifying cases of delivery returns, for example 'Return Delivery via Delivery Note'

variables.name: ato_goods_receipt_events
variables.description: Events identifying the receipt of goods, for example 'Create Goods Receipt'

variables.name: ato_goods_receipt_reversal_events
variables.description: Events identifying the reversal of a Goods Receipt, for example 'Reverse Goods Receipt'

variables.name: ato_compliant_event_sequence
variables.description: Sequence of events that fulfil the compliance requirements of an Acquire-to-Onboard process, for example ^ 'Create PO Item' ~> 'Create Goods Receipt' ~> 'Create Asset Item' $

defaultValues.defaultValue: 'Create PR Item' ~> 'Create PO Item' ~> 'Create Goods Receipt' ~> 'Create Asset Item' ~> 'Capitalize Asset Item' ~> 'Create FI Invoice' $

variables.name: ato_two_way_match_condition
variables.description: Condition identifying cases with a two-way attribute match, for example "PO Item Net Order Value" = "PO Item Total Invoiced Net Amount Document Curr."

defaultValues.defaultValue: "PO Item Net Order Value" = "PO Item Total Invoiced Net Amount Document Curr."

variables.name: ato_po_item_cancellation_events
variables.description: Events indicating that a purchase order item was cancelled, for example 'Delete PO Item'

variables.name: ato_delivery_due_date
variables.description: Attribute referring to the date when the delivery is due, for example "PO Item Last Requested Delivery Date"

variables.name: ato_goods_receipt_date
variables.description: Attribute referring to the date when the goods have been received, for example DATE_TRUNC('day', "Last GR Creation Date")

variables.name: ato_late_delivery_condition
variables.description: Condition identifying cases that are delivered too late, for example DATE_TRUNC('day', "Last GR Creation Date") > "PO Item Last Requested Delivery Date"

defaultValues.defaultValue: DATE_TRUNC('day', "Last GR Creation Date") > "PO Item Last Requested Delivery Date"

variables.name: ato_overdue_delivery_condition
variables.description:
Condition identifying cases with an overdue delivery, for example DATE_TRUNC('day', NOW()) > "PO Item Last Requested Delivery Date"
	  AND "PO Item Delivery Completed" IS NULL

defaultValues.defaultValue:
DATE_TRUNC('day', NOW()) > "PO Item Last Requested Delivery Date"
	  AND "PO Item Delivery Completed" IS NULL

variables.name: ato_delivery_completed_condition
variables.description: Condition indicating that the delivery for a PO Item is completed, for example "PO Item Delivery Completed" = 'Yes'

variables.name: ato_maverick_buying_po_after_invoice_condition
variables.description: Event flow indicating that the Purchase Order was created after the creation of the Invoice, for example 'Create FI Invoice' ~> 'Create PO Item'

variables.name: ato_maverick_buying_price_change_condition
variables.description: Event flow indicating that price changes happened after the Goods Receipt event, for example 'Create Goods Receipt' ~> 'Update PO Item Net Price'

defaultValues.defaultValue: 'Create Goods Receipt' ~> 'Update PO Item Net Price'

variables.name: ato_change_event_flow
variables.description: Event flow indicating that change events happened in a case, for example ('Update PR Net Price'|'Send Purchase Order Update'|'Update PO Item Net Price')

defaultValues.defaultValue: ('Update PR Delivery Date'|'Reactivate PR Item'|'Update PR Material'|'Update PR Quantity'|'Update PR Net Price'|'Update PO Vendor'|'Update PO Currency'|'Send PO Overdue Note'|'Dun Order Confirmation'|'Send Purchase Order Update'|'Reactivate PO Item'|'Update PO Item Material'|'Update PO Item Quantity'|'Update PO Item Net Price'|'Update PO Item Plant'|'Update PO Confirmed Delivery Date'|'Reverse Goods Receipt'|'Reverse Invoice')

variables.name: ato_automation_condition
variables.description: Attributes indicating that an event was automated, for example "EventCreatedByUserType" = 'System','Service'

variables.name: ato_invoice_reversal_events
variables.description: Events identifying the reversal of an Invoice, for example 'Reverse Invoice'
